en: The Secretary for Justice, Ms Teresa Cheng, SC, will visit Beijing from tomorrow (July 27) to July 30.

While in Beijing, Ms Cheng will meet with officials from various ministries and authorities. She will also sign a number of co-operation arrangements in order to enhance training and exchanges between the Mainland and Hong Kong in the areas of legal, dispute resolution and deal-making services.
Ms Cheng will travel to Beijing from Shenzhen tomorrow and will return to Hong Kong via Shenzhen on July 31.Ends/Monday, July 26, 2021
zh: 律政司司長鄭若驊資深大律師明日（七月二十七日）至七月三十日訪問北京。
在北京期間，鄭若驊將會與不同部委和機關的官員會面，亦會簽署合作文件，加強內地與香港就法律、爭議解決和促成交易方面的培訓和交流。
鄭若驊明日由深圳前往北京，並於七月三十一日由北京經深圳返港。2021年7月26日（星期一）

en: The Secretary for Justice, Ms Teresa Cheng, SC, will visit Beijing from tomorrow (July 27) to July 30.
While in Beijing, Ms Cheng will meet with officials from various ministries and authorities

She will also sign a number of co-operation arrangements in order to enhance training and exchanges between the Mainland and Hong Kong in the areas of legal, dispute resolution and deal-making services.
Ms Cheng will travel to Beijing from Shenzhen tomorrow and will return to Hong Kong via Shenzhen on July 31.Ends/Monday, July 26, 2021
